ygData.subject: Re: teleporters
ygData.msgSnippet: I d like to see teleporters that work when you pause on them, rather than just teleporting anyone who happens to step on them. This would probably also help

I'd like to see teleporters that work when you pause
on them, rather than just teleporting anyone who
happens to step on them. This would probably also help
with fast characters who can't ever seem to step on
the one spot that would teleport them to where they
want to go.
   -T.
